header.title: Akismet for phpBB3
header.description:
Possibly the best way in the world to protect you from web spam, now fully integrated with phpBB3.
Akismet (for phpBB3) filters out your comment spam for you, so you can focus on more important things.
header.author-notes: PHP5 is required, if your host does not support PHP5, find a new one.

changelog.change: Security - Do not allow unauthorized users to "remove spam." Thanks jsebean for noticing this and letting me know.
